title: Workforce Housing Studio Apts for $700/Month Including Utilities
posting_body: ['Bantam Apartments - Airways Memphis', '288 sq.ft.', 'efficiency studio for $700/month', 'Utilities Included: water, trash, electric, waste', '2949 Airways Blvd.', 'Memphis, TN 38131', 'Call for availablility:', 'show contact info', 'Bantam Apartments on Airways Boulevard is accepting residents with dozens of newly renovated apartments available!', 'Located in the Southeastern area of Memphis, Bantam Apartments-Airways is an workforce housing community for anyone on a tight budget.', '24/7 security and on-site laundry.', 'The apartments are rented unfurnished.', 'APARTMENT FEATURES:', 'Utilities included: water, trash, electric, waste', 'Fully renovated with new tile floors, updated kitchen and bathroom, and new paint', 'Refrigerator', 'Microwave', 'Double burner cooktop or stove/oven', 'Full bath with tub/shower', 'Air conditioning/heating', 'On-site laundry facility', 'Wheelchair Accessible (limited ground-floor units)', 'On-site parking', '24/7 security cameras and night guard', 'On-site maintenance and property management team', 'RENTAL APPLICATION REQUIREMENTS:', 'Minimum income of twice the monthly rent', 'Proof of 3 months verified earned income history', 'No recent evictions', 'Background check required', 'Section 8 not accepted as rent payment', 'Additional Info:', 'Cats are allowed with a $300 pet fee.', 'Dogs are generally not allowed except in cases of service animals.', 'Public bus transportation located directly in front of the property, Airways Blvd @ Directors Row', '10-minute drive to Save A Lot, Kroger, and Aldi grocery stores', 'Located nearby to large employers: Amazon Delivery Station, FedEx World Hub, UPS, Memphis International Airport, and Walmart Distribution', 'About One Stop Housing:', 'At One Stop Housing, our philosophy is to provide clean, safe, and affordable housing to the general public.', 'We offer functional and cost-effective workforce housing, many with utilities included.', 'Our rental operation across central Florida and in Memphis, TN, has helped bring affordable housing for more than 15 years.']
